Habitat: On seaweed (
Sargassum
sp.); in the interior of rocky blocks; in pools in the intertidal zone; in reef environments.
Observation: Found in almost all the beaches and islands of the archipelago.

Habitat: Under rocks; in bottom sand-muddy, sand-slimy; in reefs environments.
Observations: brownish coloration.
